note_served_time_not_shortening: Note: This is not a reduction, but time already served.
confirm_reset_message: Do you really want to reset the calculator? All your inputs will be lost.
calc_intro:
Do you want to complete your apprenticeship part-time?
Then you're in the right place.
Find out instantly how long your part-time training will take.
label_fulltime_hours: How many hours per week does your full-time education involve?
info_fulltime_hours: Please enter the contractual full-time hours of your company here (usually 38-40). The calculator will use this to calculate your part-time percentage.
label_parttime_hours: How many hours per week would you like to work part-time?
info_parttime_hours: Please enter here how many hours per week you want to work part-time. This allows the calculator to see how much your training will be extended.
label_training_duration: How many months does your full-time training last?
info_training_duration: Please select the usual full-time duration of your training (e.g., 24, 36, or 42 months according to your contract).
question_parttime_start: How would you like to complete your training?
info_parttime_start:
Are you planning to start full-time? Enter the number of months here.
Or have you already worked full-time? Then enter the number of months you have already worked here.
info_age: Are you over 21 at the start of your training? In many cases, you can then shorten it by up to 12 months.
question_school: What is your highest school qualification?
option_school_high: technical college entrance qualification / high school diploma
info_school: The higher your school qualification, the more likely it is that a reduction in duration will be possible. Select the highest qualification you have.
question_experience: Have you already gained some relevant work experience (e.g., through an internship)?
info_experience: Relevant internships or jobs can be credited if they are relevant to the apprenticeship.
question_apprenticeship: Have you already completed a relevant apprenticeship?
info_apprenticeship: A suitable, already completed training program can significantly shorten your new training program.
question_study: Did you study at a college or university and earn at least 30 ECTS (credit points) there?
info_study: Have you already taken courses during your studies that are relevant to the training program? If you have earned 30 ECTS credits or more, the training program can be shortened.
question_familycare: Are you currently caring for a child or a family member?
info_familycare: Caring for your own children or close relatives can be a reason for shortening the training period.
result_served_header: Full-time at the beginning of your training
result_served_copy: You plan to work full-time for these months at the beginning before switching to part-time.
result_shortening_copy: The reasons for the reduction are listed here.
result_remaining_copy: This is the remaining duration in full-time.
result_remaining_detail: This is the remaining duration in full-time (after taking into account all reasons for shortening and deducting the time already worked).
result_parttime_copy: Explanation of the part-time adjustment is shown here.
result_parttime_detail_zero: Reducing weekly hours from {full}h to {part}h leads to a minor extension of {grace} months that is often ignored in practice.
result_parttime_detail_extend: Reducing weekly hours from {full}h to {part}h for the remaining duration extends the training by {months} months.
result_early_body: Good performance can enable a shortening of additional 6 months. The application is made to the competent body (e.g. IHK/HWK) and is independent of the reasons calculated here.
disclaimer_text: The results are for guidance only and create no legal claim.
disclaimer_more: A detailed explanation of the calculation can be found here:
result_extension_cap:
⚠️ Warning: The total duration may only be extended by half of the regular training duration (max. {maxAllowedTotalDuration} months).
Solution: Increase the part-time hours per week.
pdf_summary_extension: Extension due to part-time training: {extension} months
pdf_footer_note: Note: This calculation is for guidance only and does not constitute legal advice.
error_parttime_minimum: Part-time must be at least 50% of full-time.
error_parttime_less_than_full: It must be less than full-time.
error_months_less_than: Must be less than max months.
reason_familycare: Caring for one's own children or close relatives
privacy_text_1: Protecting your data is important to us. All inputs you make in this part-time training calculator and the resulting calculation results are stored only temporarily in your browser's session storage.
privacy_point_1: No transmission: Your data is never sent to a server or third parties. All processing happens locally on your device.
privacy_point_2: Automatic deletion: As soon as you close the browser tab or window in which you use the calculator, all your entries and results are automatically and permanently deleted.
privacy_text_3: This short-term storage only ensures that your inputs are kept while you navigate within the page during your current session.
